name: Dark Castle
storyline: Shrouded in black clouds, the Dark Castle strikes fear in all who lay eyes upon it. The Black Knight rules the land with an iron fist from inside its walls. Only Prince Duncan can end his evil tyranny. Join him in his quest to bring down the Black Knight by exploring the Dark Castle, picking up magical items, solving puzzles and battling the Knight's evil minions. Only you can return peace to the people!
summary: This is the remake of the first Dark Castle for legacy cell phones, featuring color graphics, levels are a mix between Dark Castle and Beyond Dark Castle as well as scaled down difficulty.
